meanings.sent1: The tall fence was hedgier than the short one.
meanings.sent2: The green hedge was hedgier than the brown one.
meanings.sent3: The hedgehog felt hedgier than the squirrel on the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her words were hedgier than a maze, leading me in circles.
meanings.sent5: The thorny hedge looked even hedgier under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: More inclined to hedge bets or be cautious.
meanings.sent1: He became hedgier after losing a lot of money in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: She felt hedgier about the decision after hearing the risks.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed hedgier than the dog when it came to trying new food.
meanings.sent4: His cautious nature made him hedgier than a turtle in a race.
meanings.sent5: The hesitant investor grew even hedgier as the market became more volatile.
